DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether exenatide pramlintide improve blood glucose control meal compare insulin alone .
DOC.brief_title: Exenatide ( Byetta ) Versus Pramlintide ( Symlin ) : Role Post-Prandial Hyperglycemia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 12 21 year . 2 . HbA1C le 9 % 3 . Subjects must intensive insulin management 4 . Cpeptide le 0.3 ng/ml 5 . Tanner stage great equal 3 6 . Having T1DM least one year 7 . T1DM define ADA criterion least one follow antibody a. AntiGAD ( glutamic acid decarboxylase ) b. Antiislet cell 512 ( ICA512 ) c. Antiinsulin 8 . Willing give consent . 1 . Type 2 diabetes . 2 . Having chronic condition except hypothyroidism stable medication . 3 . On chronic medication may affect glucose excursion . 4 . Anemia define Hb le 9 gm/dl . 5 . Abnormal AST , ALT , amylase , lipase creatinine ( twice normal ) . 6 . Unsupportive family environment determine clinician and/or social worker . 7 . Pregnant lactating mother
